object_name.value: Validate selected document has all Document Trainings completed

title.value: This condition verifies for the selected CAT1 document all Document Trainings has completed.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
The selected document ''$value(object_name)'' has pending training tasks that must be completed prior to making the document Effective.

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select * from cd_training_record r, cd_controlled_doc (all) d where d.r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and d.training_before_effective = true and r.document_id = d.r_object_id and r.a_status='Pending')
